sentences.en: A number of men were detached to guard the right flank.
sentences.cn: 派遣了一些士兵守卫右翼.

sentences.en: By a sudden movement, we uncovered the enemy's right flank.
sentences.cn: 我们突然行动攻击敌人的右翼.

sentences.en: Flank pain associated with burning on urination, suggests renal calculi.
sentences.cn: 侧腹痛伴有排尿灼表明是肾结石.

sentences.en: Flank steak and filet mignon are presumably safer.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克牛排和美味肉片,大概比较安全吧.

sentences.en: From the hip to the knee her flank was against his.
sentences.cn: 她的身体从臀部到膝部都贴着他的身体.

sentences.en: He pulled the overalls aside and studied her smooth white flank.
sentences.cn: 他拉开工作服,看她白皙的侧身.

sentences.en: He put his hand on the dog's flank.
sentences.cn: 他把手放在狗的胁腹上。

sentences.en: Sardinia and Corsica lie on the flank of the long Italian boot.
sentences.cn: 撒丁与科西嘉位于意大利靴形半岛之侧面.

sentences.en: The assault element, led by Captain Ramirez, opened up from their right flank.
sentences.cn: 拉米雷斯上尉率领的突击队从他们的右翼开火。

sentences.en: The enemy on the right flank is now like a spent arrow and no longer a threat to our position.
sentences.cn: 右翼的敌人已经是强弩之末,不能再威胁我们的阵地了.

sentences.en: The rider dug his spurs into the horse's flank.
sentences.cn: 骑马者用靴刺戳了戳马的侧腹.

sentences.en: They continued along the flank of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着山的一侧继续前行。

sentences.en: they were to hit the tail of the column in flank.
sentences.cn: 他们当时打算从侧面进攻纵队的尾部。

sentences.en: We were attacked on our left flank.
We were taken in flank by a troop of cavalry.
sentences.cn: 我们翼侧受到一队骑兵的袭击.

words.tran_cn: 侧面堡垒；侧卫；在侧面的人或物

trans.tran_en: the side of an animal’s or person’s body, between the ribs and the hip
the side of an animal’s or person’s body, between the  ribs  and the  hip
to be on both sides of someone or something
to be on both sides of someone or something
